I ran an experiment last month to see how much including an external link would affect the reach of the post.
So, I created two posts with almost identical newsfeed messages, but in one I included the link and in the other I put the link in the first comment.

Software that makes the digital marketing process super easy and increases ROIDigital Panda is a cross network digital marketing automation and reporting software company. We support Facebook & Instagram, Google Display Network, AdWords, Remarketing on Google & Facebook, and Google Product Listing Ads. We provide end-to-end digital marketing services that include strategy development, creative development, ad execution, optimization, and reporting.

Style Council Member advising Phoenix Fashion Week on matters related to go-to-market strategy, scaling operations, people, finance, and innovation.Phoenix Fashion Week is the leading fashion industry event in the Southwest. The organization’s mission is to bridge the gap between national and international designers and premier retailers and top fashion media. Phoenix Fashion Week’s ultimate goal is to garner global exposure for Arizona’s fashion industry. Through educational fashion seminars, year-round fashion events, and charitable partnerships, Phoenix Fashion Week is gaining rapid acclaim for its community-service efforts and for infusing world-class innovation into the Southwest.SAVE THE DATE Phoenix Fashion Week - Oct. 4-7, 2017

Advisor and mentor for member companies of Galvanize, offering guidance on topics such as go-to-market strategy, pricing strategy, scaling operations, people, finance, and innovation.Galvanize is an education company that blends the lines between learning and working. We create easy access for anyone who has the aptitude and drive to succeed with technology, especially in data science, engineering and entrepreneurship. Our campuses are home to instructors, students, startups and others who are dedicated to level up their skills.

Several months ago I had the fortune to be introduced to Jared by a mutual contact.  Little did I know this was going to be one of my most influential and prominent connections in the Valley’s startup world.  Jared has proven to be extremely selfless with his time, experience and knowledge, giving back and mentoring early stage entrepreneurs.  His candid and strategic advice is always thought provoking and on point.  I would highly recommend Jared to anyone, and look forward to working with him on future endeavors.

When you are new to the startup world and trying to build a business, it is very hard to know who you can really trust and rely on. We were so fortunate to have met Jared when we did. Jared is very special in the sense that he not only has the experience and knowledge to help, but he also connects with you to help you achieve your goals. Jared always given actionable advice and helps you with your "next steps" regardless of where you are at. We will definitely continue to work with Jared, and we highly recommend him to anyone looking for trustworthy and real advice. Thank you again for every, Jared!

Randy Gibb
Dean, Colangelo College of Business at Grand Canyon University
May 22, 2017, Jared worked with Randy in the same group

I met Jared in 2014.  He was and still is today a very active part of our Colangelo College of Business Advisory Board.    Jared is also on the GCU President' STEM Advisory Board.   As a GCU alumni, he is proud and supportive of all the work going on at GCU.Jared's passion for linking higher education with industry is un-matched.  His keen insight into information technology has made him an invaluable board member for GCU.  He has provided specific input regarding our MS in Information Technology Management degree program during the creation and development stages.  Jared is highly motivated to see the Phoenix Valley go to the next level with technology entrepreneurship as well.  He is an active member of the Canyon Angels, our angel investment group.  For a board member to be so involved, supportive, and active is unique.  Many alumni and board members  support but Jared's actions and involvement are truly impressive as he is 'all in' to see GCU succeed and to help lift-up the Phoenix Valley.
Randy Gibb
Dean, Colangelo College of Business at Grand Canyon University

Andrew is more than a lawyer. Of course he does an excellent job at assessing risk, reviewing documents/contracts, managing people, and all the mechanics of legal work.But what makes Andrew special, and someone you would definitely want to add to your team, is that he brings an executive level critical thinking insight to the table. With Andrew you get the legal risk assessment side coupled with the analysis you would expect from a C level executive.I have known and worked with Andrew for over 10 years and I highly recommend him.

summary: Jared is the co-founder & CEO at Digital Panda - read more at digitalpanda.com.Jared is an innovative, visionary, growth focused CEO with over 20 years experience starting, scaling, and managing tech companies. "Jared spent some time consulting with us at Picmonic on our go-to-market and pricing strategy. The results speak for themselves - we implemented a strategy Jared outlined for us and saw a 40% increase in sales conversions."​ - Ron Robertson, CEO, Picmonic“Jared is that very rare breed of an incredible thought leader with a bias for action driven by timeless values.” - Kevin Freiberg, International Best-selling Author✔ Entrepreneur with successful exit in 2016✔ 17 years CEO experience✔ Scaled operations from 0-50k+ customers, 40 employees, 3 Locations (2 in U.S., 1 in Europe)✔ Created $2MM+ recurring revenue overnight by recognizing opportunity✔ Grew top line revenue 50+% year-over-year for 5 years in a row
